CssProperty.name: flow-from
CssProperty.description: Gets or sets a value that identifies a Connected Frame container in the document that accepts the content flow from the data source.

CssProperty.name: flow-into
CssProperty.description: Gets or sets a value that identifies an iframe container in the document that serves as the Connected Frame data source.

CssProperty.name: region-fragment
CssProperty.description: The 'region-fragment' property controls the behavior of the last region associated with a named flow.

entry.description: Content flows as it would in a regular content box.
If the content fits within the CSS Region, then this property has no effect.
